channel.title: Sqlboiler on Wildan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Sqlboiler on Wildan's Blog

item.title: GraphQL + SQLBoiler Generator
item.description: This note as a continuation of my journey with Go template. Based on the knowledge of what template package can do, we’ll generate a resolvers code from a given sqlboiler model struct to to satisfy graphql implementation of neelance/graphql-go.
